title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, April 25, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of 'First Lady of Song' Ella Fitzgerald (1917), who said, "The only thing better than singing is more singing."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of 'First Lady of Song' Ella Fitzgerald (1917), who said, "The only thing better than singing is more singing."
